description:
The courses in the game will allow you to push the available vehicles to their limits! Test their maximum speed on wide roads, check how well they handle on narrow obstacle courses. Make huge jumps and see if you can land safely!

FEATURES:
- 10 awesome cars
- Demanding and varied race tracks
- 50 exciting missions
- Intuitive controls

Prove yourself as one of the best drivers in the world! Each of the ten cars comes with its own set of challenges. You will be driving fast, maneuverable sports cars - but that's not all. You will also get to sit behind the wheel of a powerful 4x4 or a rally car.

All of the vehicles available in the game share one crucial detail - they are top of the line, high performance cars well suited to breaking all kinds of records. The actual task of doing that will, of course, be up to you!

Every mission takes place in a carefully crafted course, which sole purpose is to test your driving skill and let you try out the best cars available. Discover and complete all of them.

Completing missions in a perfect time will earn you money that you can use to buy new vehicles and unlock additional challenges. Play, practice, don't give up and you will be able to finish all of them.
name: Car Racing Trials
